original: unfold Partial.ImpSmallStepSemantics. intros P iP state state_R SSS ImpSmallStepSemantics. destruct ImpSmallStepSemantics as [eval_bool _ _ _ _ _ _]. apply {| eval_bool := eval_bool; eval_bool_stable := fun b => eval_bool_stable P iP state state_R SSS b; step_defined := fun c s notSkip => step_defined P iP state state_R SSS notSkip c s; step_Sskip := fun s mcs => step_Sskip P iP state state_R SSS s mcs; step_Ssequence := fun c1 c2 s mcs H => step_Ssequence P iP state state_R SSS c1 c2 s mcs H |}.
